data.name: Colors Assemble
data.detailed_description:
Follow Us for Game Updates!

Wishlisted the Game already? THANKS!!! You can also Follow Us on Our Discord Server and Social Pages to be part of the developent process and regular small updates of this game. You can also Ask me anything about the game on the Discord Channel.


About the Game

Help Brad reunite with his family and complete all hand-crafted 2D platform challenges in a colorful twisted world.

Game Features


  • Change Player Color to Match Ground Colors
  • Game Rule #1: Player Color should be Red if its landing on a Red Ground.
  • Discover many more Rules
  • Color Specific Platforms
  • Lots of Collectibles
  • Unlock Doors with Conditions
  • Unlock New Player Colors
  • Discover Hidden Areas
  • Metroidvania Style Design
  • Start with Single Jump and Walk and collect Skills such as Double Jump, Dash as you progress.
  • Handcrafted Platform Puzzles
  • Lots of achievements and rewards!
  • Replay with all skills and collectibles with New Game Plus Mode

Handcrafted Puzzles

Each Color Obstacle Type has different condition with each color player.


Conditional Doors

Change Your Player Color to open Many Locked Conditional Doors.


Designed and Developed By Dibakar Jana.

data.short_description: Help Brad reunite with his family and complete all hand-crafted 2D platform challenges in a colorful twisted world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended

mac_requirements.recommended:
